name: Biomedical Laboratories Centre
goal: Biomedical Laboratories Centre is an educational biomedical association. It aims to administer healthcare professionals, professionals in training and other interested people with expertise and further professional development in various Biomedical Laboratory Science areas.
euInitiatives:
- EU lifelong-learning-policy
- The European Credit system for Vocational Education and Training (ECVET)
- Recommendation on Key Competences for Lifelong Learning
